SJ iCenter - Responsive Joomla Template
SJ iCenter - This is an impressive Joomla Template for Joomla 3.x, integrating K2 and EasyBlog Component.

Be built with IOS7 flat design, harmonious color combinations, creative and modern layout. It is an extremely flexible template with lots of useful shortcode, 2 layout styles: Wide and Boxed with highly customizable backgrounds, RTL language... You are free to custom your own template. Moreover, there are many additional pages included with this template like About Us, Portfolio, Pricing table and Photo Gallery for a multi-purpose website. SJ iCenter would be perfect template that really suitable for technology product reviews website, personal blog to professional blog, magazine, businessÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s portfolio and company websites, or even any multi-purpose website...

Besides this responsive design, it is the first template that is energized with EasyBlog and K2 Component. The combination will make your website reached to a new level. Last but not least, you will be own a wide range of powerful extensions: Large Slider with smooth transition effects, SJ Responsive Listing with unlimited loader for showing products... We're sure that you will have a wonderful website, which visually captures the client's interest.

Note: EasyBlog is the 3rd Party component from StackIdeas. To use this component in our template, please buy HERE. (If you are SmartAddons member, you will be received 20% OFF for EasyBlog. You can find the coupon code in our Partners Promotions page)

Check out more interesting features of it, you'll love it!
